    • Method Detail

      • moveHero

        public boolean moveHero(Game.Direction direction)
        Checks if the hero can move in the specified Game.Direction. If is possible, it will move the hero.
        Parameters:
        direction - Game.Direction in which to move the hero.
        Returns:
        true if the hero has moved, false otherwise.

      • nextTurn

        public boolean nextTurn(Game.Direction heroDirection)
        Checks if the game is running, using the isGameRunning() method. If it is, it will try to move the hero in the specified Game.Direction. It will then update the dragons in the maze, using updateDragons(), and then update the general game state using update().
        Parameters:
        heroDirection - Game.Direction in which the hero will try to move.
        Returns:
        Maze#moveHero(Direction)

      • updateDragons

        public void updateDragons()
        Updates the dragons in the maze depending on the gameMode.

      • moveDragon

        public void moveDragon(int i,
                       Game.Direction direction)
        Moves the Dragon in the dragons array with the index specified in the direction given.
        Parameters:
        i - Index of the dragon
        direction - Game.Direction in which to move the dragon.

      • update

        public void update()
        Updated the general gameState. Checks if the hero can pick up a swords and picks it up if he can. Checks if there is any Dragon adjacent to the hero and, if it is, changes the gameState accordingly.
